main event: A witness observed a window lit up with a red-orange glow and heard a hum on 8 October 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 52 seconds., The object was possibly a meteor sighting or an unidentified light reflection., Witness did not investigate further into the room., The report mentioned that the data was classified as insufficient., The sighting occurred around the same time as other unidentified reports in the area.
sighted object: one unidentified object emitting a red-orange glow
witness description: the witness heard a hum and observed the glow
